AboutPage.title: About RexStudios
AboutPage.description1: At RexStudios we transform ideas into Minecraft worlds that rise above mere entertainment to become genuine platforms for storytelling, community building, and brand identity. Our multidisciplinary team—game designers, builders, and modelers—shares a single goal: to craft bespoke experiences that captivate from the very first moment and deliver lasting value to creators, companies, and public or private servers alike. Every block, texture, and mechanic is orchestrated so that immersion is immediate and the memory profound.
AboutPage.description2:
Throughout our journey we have shaped versatile combat arenas, open-ended exploration routes, and themed hubs capable of hosting series, live events, and launch campaigns—all bound by one common thread: the ability to turn an initial vision into an environment that sparks new stories and rallies an audience. We pay particular attention to gameplay flow, challenge pacing, and aesthetic consistency, ensuring each visitor feels the world breathing in sync with their actions.

Collaboration is our guiding principle. We involve clients in ideation sessions, pre-visualisation, and early testing to keep every detail true to the project’s essence while still surprising those who explore it. This ongoing dialogue lets us seize improvement opportunities, fine-tune difficulty, and refine visual narrative without losing production agility.

Our methodology rests on three pillars: thorough audience research, controlled creative iteration, and continuous play-testing in real-world settings. With in-house version control and simultaneous review tools, we guarantee a final result that is stable, intuitive, and scalable—ready to grow with future expansions or integrate seamlessly into existing ecosystems.

If your aim is to stand out with a unique Minecraft experience, RexStudios offers the perfect blend of artistic vision and professional rigour. We are ready to turn any concept—no matter how ambitious—into a memorable world, prepared to evolve alongside you and your community over time.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: We value your privacy and want you to understand how your information is handled. This Policy (last updated 3 June 2025) explains what data we collect, why we collect it and how you can exercise your rights.
PrivacyPage.dataUsage: RexStudios collects only the personal data needed to operate the platform and to keep your account secure. Details are set out in the sections below; no sensitive data is stored unless you choose to provide it.
PrivacyPage.thirdParty: We never sell your information. Data are shared only with service providers strictly necessary for hosting and analytics, each bound by adequate contractual safeguards and—where applicable—EU Standard Contractual Clauses.
PrivacyPage.contact: For any questions about this Policy or the processing of your personal data, e-mail us at [contact email].

sections.heading: 1. Controller
sections.body: The controller is the independent developer team behind RexStudios ("we" or "us"). You can reach us at [contact email].

sections.heading: 2. Personal Data We Collect
sections.body:
• Registration data – name, e-mail and encrypted password.
• Optional profile data – avatar and biography.
• Usage data – IP address, access logs and in-platform events.
• Cookies and similar technologies – device identifiers and preferences.

sections.heading: 3. Purposes and Legal Bases (Art. 6 GDPR)
sections.body:
a) Service provision and account management – performance of the contract.
b) Analytics and platform improvement – legitimate interest.
c) Fraud prevention and security – legal obligation and legitimate interest.
d) Commercial newsletters – consent.

sections.heading: 4. Recipients
sections.body: Data may be processed by our EU-based hosting provider, privacy-friendly analytics services with IP anonymisation, and—where legally required—public authorities or courts.

sections.heading: 5. International Transfers
sections.body: We transfer data outside the EEA only if the recipient offers adequate safeguards, such as an EU adequacy decision or Standard Contractual Clauses.

sections.heading: 6. Retention Periods
sections.body:
• User accounts – for the lifetime of the account and up to five years after closure to address potential liabilities.
• Security logs – 12 months.
• Marketing consents – until you withdraw consent.

sections.heading: 7. Your Rights
sections.body: You may request access, rectification, erasure, restriction, portability or objection by writing to [contact email] and providing proof of identity. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (www.aepd.es).

sections.heading: 8. Information Security
sections.body: We apply TLS encryption, salted-hash passwords, encrypted backups and strict access controls to safeguard confidentiality and integrity.

sections.heading: 9. Cookies
sections.body: We use essential cookies plus analytics cookies subject to your consent. Non-essential cookies can be configured or refused via the consent banner.

sections.heading: 10. Minors
sections.body: The Platform is not directed to children under 14. If we learn that personal data of a minor have been collected, we will delete them without delay.

sections.heading: 11. Changes to This Policy
sections.body: We may update this Policy; significant changes will be announced 15 days in advance via an on-site notice or e-mail.

sections.heading: 12. Contact
sections.body: If you have any privacy-related queries, write to [contact email] with the subject line “Data Protection”.
